mapper.select: SELECT r.`id`, r.`title`, r.`section_id`, r.`station_id`, r.`sub_id`, r.`staff_name`, r.`responsible`, r.`up_time`,r.`plan_time`, r.`description`, r.`active`, l.`station_name` as `station_name`, f.`subcontractors_name` as `sub_name` FROM `smart_site`.`riskrectify` r INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`station` l ON r.`station_id`=l.`id` INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`subcontractors` f ON r.`sub_id`=f.`id` where r.`riskshow_id`=#{riskshow_id}
